settings.title: Settings
settings.languagePrompt: Relaunch the app to apply the new language
settings.loginOrOutPrompt: Click the link below to log in or log out in the new window, and then close it
settings.secretPrompt: Your secret token will remain on your device and will not be shared with anyone else

header.clearMessages: Clear all messages in this chat?

footer.promptPlaceholder: Type a message. (Shift+Enter to add a new line)

error.solveChallenge: Kindly click on the link below, follow the instructions on the page to solve challenges / CAPTCHA, then close the window.

chat.name: Chats
chat.exportImportDesc: Export / Import settings and chats, excluding bot settings and API keys.
chat.exportDesc: Exporter will create a .ChatALL file containing data excluding bot settings and API keys. Confirm export?
chat.importDesc: Importer will attempt to merge and update your current chat with the selected .ChatALL exported file. Back up your data by clicking Export to save the current chat history and settings. This allows restoration in case of import errors. Confirm import?
chat.confirmDeleteAllChatHistory: Are you sure you want to delete all chat history? This action cannot be undone.
chat.botNameDesc: name of the selected responseâ€™s bot
chat.updateDebounceIntervalDesc: The value controls the message update speed when the AI bot responds. A higher value delays the message processing and updates them all at once, which is more efficient. A lower value updates the messages faster, but may cause performance issues.

bot.name: Null Bot
bot.notAvailable: The bot is not available because not login or not configured correctly.
bot.waiting: Waiting for other { botName } request(s) to complete...
bot.pastRounds: How many rounds of past chats to carry?
bot.pastRoundsPrompt: The more historical chats carried, the better the effect of multi-round dialogue, but it will also consume more costs

azureOpenaiApi.name: Azure OpenAI Service
azureOpenaiApi.temperaturePrompt: The higher the temperature, the more creative the text, but the more likely it is to be incoherent
azureOpenaiApi.azureOpenAIApiDeploymentNamePrompt: View the deployment name in Management -> Deployments at https://oai.azure.com/

cohereApi.name: Cohere API
cohereApi.temperaturePrompt: Adjust output randomness from 0 to 5. Lower temperatures ensure precise, consistent answers, suitable for tasks like summarization. Higher temperatures promote creativity but may reduce coherence, especially in brief or context-specific prompts.

bingChat.name: Copilot
bingChat.solveCaptcha: You need to solve CAPTCHA to continue.

chatGpt.name: ChatGPT
chatGpt.autoRefreshPrompt: If you're NOT being asked to log in frequently, do NOT enable this feature
chatGpt.notice: Only paid Plus members can use GPT-4

geminiApi.name: Gemini API
geminiApi.topKPrompt: A topK of 1 means the selected token is the most probable among all the tokens in the model's vocabulary (also called greedy decoding)
geminiApi.topPPrompt: Tokens are selected from the most to least probable until the sum of their probabilities equals the topP value.

gradio.fnIndexPrompt: The fn_index of the function you will request. Mostly it is 0
gradio.name: Gradio
gradio.queueFull: The queue is full, please try again later
gradio.urlPrompt: URL of your Gradio app. If using Hugging Face space, get the direct url by clicking the "Embed this space" in the upper right corner.
gradio.waiting: There are { queue_size } requests in the queue, you are in { rank }th place, and you are expected to wait for { queue_eta } seconds

openaiApi.name: OpenAI API
openaiApi.alterUrlPrompt: Base URL path for API requests, leave blank if not using a proxy or service emulator
openaiApi.temperaturePrompt: The higher the temperature, the more creative the text, but the more likely it is to be incoherent

pi.name: Pi
pi.waitPiIntro: Please click the chatbot website link below and wait for the Pi introduction to finish, then close the window.

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.temperaturePrompt: Higher values produce more diverse outputs
falcon.maxNewTokensPrompt: The maximum numbers of new tokens
falcon.topPPrompt: Higher values sample more low-probability tokens

proxy.name: Proxy
proxy.byPass: Non-proxy Addresses (only effective for Normal Mode)
proxy.byPassHint: Non-proxy addresses, separated by ';', but no ';' at the end. E.g., '<local>;*.aliyun.com;*.tiangong.cn;*.xfyun.cn;*.baidu.com;*.baidubce.com'
proxy.proxyFilePathHint: You can backup this file, or modify it with other programs
proxy.resetAllMessage: All settings (include saved) will be lost. Are you sure to reset to default?
proxy.reloadMessage: All settings without save will be lost. Are you sure to reload configure file?
proxy.saveAndActiveMessage: Apply the proxy configuration will restart ChatALL. Are you sure?
